txt.en: 'You denied it then, but grant it to me now and you will have my service evermore.'
'Yes, my lord.'
Witness the shadowy impressions evil has left upon this chamber
'You will be strong again. I will see it done.'
'Lord Sauron... I thought you dead, but you cling to life.'
Sigileth of the Hidden Guard lives still!
'Curse the Elves and Men that laid you so low!'
Witness the shadowy impressions evil has left upon this chamber
'I was overproud, and foolish. I abandoned you when you needed me the most.'
Witness the shadowy impressions evil has left upon this chamber
'Yet had I not done so, I would surely have been slain, and could not help you now.'
'I spied your servants from the height, and followed them here to you.'
'They are helpless to heal your hurts.'
'I could help you, Lord Sauron. I could minister to you in your weakness.'
Intense shadow blankets the area. What evils might this forgotten chamber have held before the fall of Sauron?
'I could make you strong again.'
DNT - Blah!
'I require a boon. I ask for that which I asked before.'
DNT - Blah!
DNT - Blah!
DNT - Blah!
You have descended a secret stairway into a hidden wing of the dungeons of Dol Guldur, where intense shadow covers its lost chambers.
DNT - Blah!
Someone is approaching from the western passage!
DNT - Blah!
'I did not summon you, Lhaereth.'
'Karazgar, come forth.'
'The Nazgûl did not fail me. For their loyalty I gave to them the Nine Keeps.'
You thought her dead, but somehow Sigileth of the Hidden Guard is still alive!
'The Blade of Lebennin has declared himself Lord of the Blood-fort! But it is mine!'
'Dragon-tamer, worm-breaker, loyal Gúrzyul...'
Shadowy impressions from the past unfold before your sight
'The Plague did not do as you claimed!'

'Is it really you, [placeholder]? I feared all my companions among the Hidden Guard were dead, but here you stand!

'I made a place of my own in these dungeons and levied terror upon their fell inhabitants in the name of my Lady. Let us return to my secret lodgings before we press through the Room of Voices, and I will collect the few belongings I left behind. I could not pass through its deep shadow on my own, but together I believe we can.

'It is good to see you again, [placeholder].'
'Seregost is my domain! You cannot give it to the Nazgûl!'
'Tell me of your plan.'
Shadowy impressions from the past unfold before your sight
'Cured by the Westman's Weed!'
'Why have you done this?'
'So you say, Karazgar. How might it be done?'
'A failure!'
'I did not fail you.'
'An ally? I seek no ally.'
Your reverie is broken by the sound of footsteps in the west passage!
'I do not want your promises.'
A powerful presence has left its mark upon this chamber, and fell voices whisper of the past.
'I will... I will make a new plague!'
'Go then, and enact your plan.'
An old companion steps into the room
'Begone!'
'This time will be different! I promise this plague will be more effective!'
A powerful presence has left its mark upon this chamber, and fell voices whisper of the past.
A powerful presence has left its mark upon this chamber, and fell voices whisper of the past.
Cautiously investigate the western passage
Talk to Sigileth in the Room of Voices
Sigileth
Shadowy impressions from the past unfold before your sight
There may be more to discover within this Room of Voices.
There may be more to discover within this Room of Voices.
'...one child only...'
'...after my victory is complete...'
'...and my rule stretches from the Sundering Sea...'
Haggard Elf
Someone is approaching from the western passage!
'...to the Uttermost East...'
'My lord.'
'Much enmity lies between the worms and the dwarves.'
'This might be enflamed to useful purpose.'
'I am skilled beyond all others at the practice of stealth.'
'In secret I will slay a number of his kin.'
'I will leave their heads outside his lair, made to look like the work of dwarves.'
'In vengeance he will descend upon them, and they will trouble you no more.'
'Then he will be receptive to your commands, and will be a worthy ally.'
'I spoke in error, Lord Sauron.'
Examine objects within the Room of Voices
Sauron
Examine objects within the Room of Voices
Cautiously investigate the western passage
'Thinno gwaith!'
'Smaug the Golden will be a worthy servant.'
'What? Can it be?'
'Is this a trick?'
'[placeholder]!'
Instance: Whispers from the Long Years
Cross the bridge and explore the room beyond
